channel.title: DFLI – Dragonfly Energy Watch
channel.description: Real-time alerts for Dragonfly Energy (DFLI): OEM deals, guidance, financings, patents, and major headlines.

item.title: DFLI — OEM mix shift & margin focus
item.description: Watch for OEM order adds and gross margin expansion; positive updates can trigger early momentum.

item.title: DFLI — Licensing revenue milestones
item.description: Monitor licensing/royalty updates (e.g., Battle Born brand deals) — recurring revenue is a key squeeze catalyst.

item.title: DFLI — Funding & dilution risk checks
item.description: Track any converts/ATM usage; clean financing or reduced burn can flip sentiment quickly.
